title: Ep244 K-pop Crimes
description: Ep244 is OUT NOW!! This week, the gals channel their inner optimistic teenager to explore the world of Korean pop music. Topics include an elevator altercation, a scandalous band of bullies, and just what the heck Gangnam is. Treat yo'self to a glass of soju, curate a playlist, and tune in for K-pop Crimes!
